body.p:
Louisa Lawrence County Kentucky
30 Dec 1865
To His Excellency
Thomas E Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky
Frankfort Ky
Sir

The undersigned citizens of Lawrence County would represent unto your Excellency that David Bates and Garred Peters citizens of this County were by the Grand Jury of Lawrence County Indicted fcharged with Horse Stealing Your Petitonr will State that the offense charged consisted in the taking of a Horse in this County by said Peters & Bates whilst they were in the regular Confederate Service and that the takeing of the same was done by said Parties ^& Bates^ under orders of this Superior office We State that these young men were raised in this County and have always conducted thenselves as good Law abiding citizens Except joning the Rebellion -- & they were never before this time indicted for any offense whatever ever but are now and always have been moral & correct young men They are not conducting themselves as good citizens & we believe that Your Excellency
ought to Pardon them of said offense by which they are indicted and as in duty bound we will ever pray you mercy &c
